overview:
Currently employed with Zeta Interactive, a large digital agency (Ad Age Top 50 Interactive Agency), John brings a vast knowledge of and established success in interactive marketing, strategy, product development, and product management.

Formerly a First Vice President for J.P. Morgan Chase & Company, he was responsible for online marketing to credit card customers. Previously, John has held a number of positions in financial services including internet technology and product management roles at Comerica Bank in Detroit. He also ran the emerging issues research program at the Bank Administration Institute in Chicago.

John began his career in financial services policy at the U.S. Department of the Treasury in Washington DC. He holds a Master of Public Administration from Columbia Universityâ€™s School of International and Public Affairs and Bachelor of Science in Business Administration from Villanova University.
